unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Seeing That Engagement?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Seeing That Engagement?**

unnormalised: Hey folks, are those follower counts truly reflecting your brand's impact? That's the big question in influencer marketing right now. New follower analytics tools are hitting the scene, promising to dissect your audience like never before. Think deeper than just likes; we're talking about real engagement, audience demographics down to the mohalla level, and ROI tracking in Rupees.
normalised: Hey folks, are those follower counts truly reflecting your brand's impact? That's the big question in influencer marketing right now. New follower analytics tools are hitting the scene, promising to dissect your audience like never before. Think deeper than just likes; we are talking about real engagement, audience demographics down to the mohalla level, and R O I tracking in rupees.

unnormalised: Turns out, some "influencers" in Delhi might be buying followers, shocking right? These new tools are catching fake accounts faster than you can say "chai time at 4:00 PM". They track things like comment sentiment and follower activity patterns since Jan 1st, 2023.
normalised: Turns out, some "influencers" in Delhi might be buying followers, shocking right? These new tools are catching fake accounts faster than you can say "chai time at four P M". They track things like comment sentiment and follower activity patterns since January first, two thousand and twenty three.

unnormalised: Industry expert Priya Sharma from IIM Bangalore noted at a recent webinar on 10/26/2024, “Authenticity is king. Brands partnering with folks boasting 1 million followers need to dig deeper before 17:30 hrs." So, before you sign that cheque for that next campaign with that cool influencer from Colaba, make sure those analytics are sparkling clean. It could save you a whole lot of face, and maybe even your Diwali bonus this year!
normalised: Industry expert Priya Sharma from I I M Bangalore noted at a recent webinar on twenty sixth October two thousand and twenty four, “Authenticity is king. Brands partnering with folks boasting one million followers need to dig deeper before seventeen thirty hours." So, before you sign that cheque for that next campaign with that cool influencer from Colaba, make sure those analytics are sparkling clean. It could save you a whole lot of face, and maybe even your Diwali bonus this year!
